column5: for A) pickeral crappie  in that order  Oh...in early June
Hmmm. thanks... but, I want to stay around the Lindsay area...
Oh, ok then...... judging by your question its asking for all the Kawartha lakes...  You're fine on any of the Tri-lakes, to be honest. They all have pretty much the same make up, and fish.
Stay away from Pigeon Lake...Ain't no fish left...Meely and Buckster's sister caught them all...
Don't remind me!    If its eye's you're after id stick with sturgeon
